contents.text: Thank you for calling Radical Designs in the East Bay, your web development cooperative empowering non-profit and grassroots social change organizations.
To inquire about new projects and proposals, press 1.
For an overview of our custom web development services, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our service coordinator.

navigationGoals: Discuss a proposal and get cost and timeline for a new nonprofit website build
I’m looking to commission a new website for my veteran support nonprofit and need information on how to start a proposal.
I’d like an overview of your custom web dev stack and a proposal outline for a new project integrating React and Node services.
I’d like information on starting a new website project for my local senior center.
I'd like to discuss a proposal for a new website for our student-led physics outreach program.

contents.text: To discuss an existing project or request support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with your project manager.

navigationGoals: Get technical support to update content on our current site
I need technical assistance on the website Radical Designs built for my veteran outreach program—some features aren’t working.
I need support on my current site’s REST API endpoints—they’re returning 500 errors after the latest deployment.
I need assistance with updates on our existing website—I’m having trouble editing the event calendar.
I need support updating content on our existing physics club website.

contents.text: For cooperative membership, partnerships, and general administration, press 2.
To learn about joining our co-operative or collaborating on social change initiatives, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our community outreach team.

navigationGoals: Find out how to join the co-operative or partner on social change projects
I want to join Radical Designs as a veteran-led partner in your cooperative to collaborate on social change projects.
I’m exploring membership—interested in joining your co-op as a collaborator on open-source CMS integrations.
I want to learn how my nonprofit can join your cooperative and collaborate on projects.
I'm interested in joining the cooperative to partner on social change web projects through my university physics society.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, or accounting questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our finance department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a discrepancy on our latest invoice and update billing details
I have a question about an invoice for the website you developed for my veteran assistance organization.
I need the invoice details for last month’s development work and to set up automated ACH billing.
I’m calling about my invoice; I need help understanding the charges for our website maintenance.
I have a question about the invoice for our physics outreach website project.
